item.title: App Marketing predictions using MMM
item.description: What is MMM? Marketing Mix Modeling is an analysis of historical marketing data to estimate the impact of marketing channels and activities on sales and forecast the future. Put it simple: We wanna know, how our budget works. Why anybody should care about it? In terms of marketing, it is not always possible to say, that Channel X caused Y increase in sales in Z time. Everything starts with non-trackable ads, or ads that very difficult to track, like TV or billboards.
